methods.name: add
methods.description: Add inline at the end of collection

methods.name: contains
methods.description: Check if inline exists in collection

methods.name: insertAfter
methods.description: Insert inline into collection after given inline, returns true if inline was inserted

methods.name: insertBefore
methods.description: Insert inline into collection before given inline, returns true if inline was inserted

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes inline from the collection, returns true if inline was removed
